pkgmetadata.longdescription: ### RedVox Python SDK![Build Status](https://github.com/RedVoxInc/redvox-python-sdk/actions/workflows/testing.yml/badge.svg)This repository contains code for reading and working with the RedVox API 900 and API 1000 (M) data formats.* [User Documentation](https://github.com/RedVoxInc/redvox-python-sdk/tree/master/docs/python_sdk)* [API Documentation](https://redvoxinc.github.io/redvox-sdk/api_docs/redvox/index.html)* [Changelog](https://github.com/RedVoxInc/redvox-python-sdk/tree/master/docs/changelog.md)
